participant_1.name: Derek
participant_1.personality: Creative and outgoing, enjoys social activities and gaming.
participant_1.background: i like donuts. my favorite band is the insane clown posse. on weekends i do live action roleplaying events. i play a lot of call of duty.

participant_2.background: i'm a skateboarder. i am always wearing a hat. my favourite skater is rob dryden. my friends are all skateboarders.
